投光照明器: (とうこうしょうめいき) - floodlight; floodlight projector
投入: (とうにゅう) - throwing into/inserting/depositing; investment/putting in (personnel, etc.); release of a product; making (an electrical circuit)
投入れ: (なげいれ) - nageire (casual or nature-imitating style of Japanese floral arrangement)
投入口: (とうにゅうこう) - insertion slot (e.g. coins, tickets); input port
投入産出表: (とうにゅうさんしゅつひょう) - input-output table; IO table
投合う: (なげあう) - to throw something to each other/to pass something back and forth/to bandy something around; {baseb} to take part in a pitching duel
投宿: (とうしゅく) - lodging; putting up at a hotel
投射角: (とうしゃかく) - angle of projection or incidence
投弾: (とうだん) - dropping a bomb/bomb drop; slingstone
投影ビューポート: (とうえいビューポート) - projection viewport
投影基準点: (とうえいきじゅんてん) - projection reference point; PRP
投影方法: (とうえいほうほう) - projection type
投扇興: (とうせんきょう) - fan tossing game
投手力: (とうしゅりょく) - pitching strength (of a team)
投手戦: (とうしゅせん) - pitching duel; pitchers' battle
投打つ: (なげうつ) - to abandon; to throw away; to fling away
投技: (なげわざ) - {sumo;MA} throw or throwing technique (sumo, judo)
投擲槍: (とうてきそう) - throwing spear; javelin
投擲競技: (とうてききょうぎ) - a throwing event
投書: (とうしょ) - letter to the editor; letter from a reader; contribution
投書欄: (とうしょらん) - letters to the editor section
投書箱: (とうしょばこ) - suggestion box; complaints box
投棄: (とうき) - abandonment; giving up; throwing away; disposal; dumping
投槍器: (とうそうき) - atlatl; woomera; spear thrower
投機: (とうき) - speculation; venture; stockjobbing; gambling (on stocks)
投物: (なげもの) - sacrifice goods; liquidation (shares); things thrown (out)
投球: (とうきゅう) - pitching; throwing a ball; bowling (in cricket); pitched ball
投石器: (とうせきき) - catapult/ballista/mangonel/onager/trebuchet; (投石器 only) sling/slingshot
投石機: (とうせきき) - catapult/ballista/mangonel/onager/trebuchet; (投石器 only) sling/slingshot
投票制度: (とうひょうせいど) - voting system
投票区: (とうひょうく) - polling or voting district
投票率: (とうひょうりつ) - voter turnout; (polling) turnout
投票用紙: (とうひょうようし) - ballot paper; voting paper
投票結果: (とうひょうけっか) - results of a vote; voting results
投票総数: (とうひょうそうすう) - total number of votes cast
投票締め切り: (とうひょうしめきり) - poll closing
投稿: (toukou) - contribution (para um jornal, revista, etc.), submission, post (on a forum, blog, etc.)
投稿一覧: (とうこういちらん) - posts list; (summary) list of all messages (threads)
投稿文: (とうこうぶん) - written contribution; submission (to a newspaper, online forum, etc.)
投稿欄: (とうこうらん) - reader's column; letters-to-the-editor column
投稿者: (とうこうしゃ) - contributor (of written material)
投資の限界効率: (とうしのげんかいこうりつ) - marginal efficiency of investment
投資利益率: (とうしりえきりつ) - return of investment
投資支出: (とうしししゅつ) - investment spending; investment expenditure
投資有価証券: (とうしゆうかしょうけん) - investments in securities
投資業界: (とうしぎょうかい) - investment industry
投資環境: (とうしかんきょう) - investment climate; investment environment
